tool_description: Analyzes traffic patterns and capacity requirements for cellular sites based on historical usage data and growth projections.

site_ids.description: Sites to analyze for traffic demand

analysis_period_days.description: Historical period for traffic analysis in days

growth_rate_percent.description: Annual traffic growth rate for projections

include_seasonal.description: Include seasonal traffic variations in analysis

service_types.description: Specific services to analyze (voice, data, video)

error_messages: Insufficient traffic data: Historical data period too short for reliable analysis, minimum 7 days required.
Invalid growth rate: Growth rate must be between -50% and 200%.
Site traffic data unavailable: One or more sites lack sufficient historical traffic records.
Invalid service type: Use supported service categories (voice, data, video, messaging).
usage: Specify site_ids and analysis parameters to get traffic demand projections. Use growth_rate_percent for future capacity planning.

peak_traffic_mbps.description: Peak traffic demand per site in Mbps

average_traffic_mbps.description: Average traffic demand per site in Mbps

busy_hour_patterns.description: Peak usage time periods for each site
